fields.name: context
fields.description:
Retrieve context information via Context ID which provided by SLS
Various Scenarios: Launch App from page Open page (from Assignment Listing page) Open page (from either Dashboard or Notification) Context will be expired in 10 seconds. Errors: Token is invalid Context does not exist Context has expired

fields.name: user
fields.description:
Retrieve user information via user ID.

Errors:
Token is invalid
User does not exist

App is not installed for this User

fields.name: subjectGroup
fields.description:
Retrieve suject group information via subject group ID.

Errors:
Token is invalid
Subject group does not exist
App is not installed for this subject group

fields.name: createAssignment
fields.description: If a resource been assigned to multiple Subject Groups, multiple assignments will be created in SLS.

fields.name: updateAssignment
fields.description: Update assignment: Leave the fields to null if unchanged.

fields.name: deleteAssignment
fields.description: Delete assignment: return the assignment UUID on success

fields.name: updateTask
fields.description: Update task status to reflect the task progress

fields.name: createNotification
fields.description: Create Notification

types.name: Context
types.description: Context information which consist of user information and event information

fields.name: user
fields.description: user information

fields.name: event
fields.description: event information

types.name: User
types.description: User in the system, either Teacher or Student.

fields.name: id
fields.description: id of user, i.e., IAMS ID

fields.name: name
fields.description: user's name, short name for Student

fields.name: role
fields.description: role of user, either Teacher or Student

fields.name: level
fields.description: level that student is in, e.g. Secondary 1. Null for teacher.

fields.name: classSerialNo
fields.description: The index number of Student in his/her form class. Applicable to Student only

fields.name: subjectGroups
fields.description:
ACTIVE subject groups that user is in. If App is not installed for a subject group,
this subject group will not be inlcuded.

For Teacher, it is the SubjectGroups that this teacher teaching
For Student, it is the SubjectGroups that this student belongs to

types.name: SubjectGroup
types.description: A group consists of teachers and students that taking the same subject

fields.name: uuid
fields.description: UUID of group

fields.name: code
fields.description: Code of group

fields.name: subject
fields.description: Subject of group: <e.g. English Language>

fields.name: level
fields.description: Level of Group: <e.g. Secondary 1>

fields.name: teachers
fields.description: Teachers that teach this group

fields.name: students
fields.description: Students that belong to this group

fields.name: assignments
fields.description: assignments that been assigned to this group's students

fields.name: uuid
fields.description: UUID for this assignment

fields.name: title
fields.description: title

fields.name: start
fields.description: start date and time, format: ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME, e.g.,2007-12-03T10:15:30+01:00

fields.name: end
fields.description: end date and time, format: ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME, e.g.,2007-12-03T10:15:30+01:00

fields.name: createdBy
fields.description: user who create this assignment

fields.name: modifiedBy
fields.description: user who change this assignment

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the assignment

fields.name: subjectGroup
fields.description: subject group that this resource been assigned to

fields.name: tasks
fields.description: List of tasks been generated

types.name: DateTime
types.description: Assignment start date, format: ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME, e.g.,2007-12-03T10:15:30+01:00

types.name: Task
types.description: A basic unit of work required for one student.

fields.name: uuid
fields.description: UUID for this task

fields.name: title
fields.description: title

fields.name: start
fields.description: start date and time

fields.name: end
fields.description: end date and time

fields.name: createdBy
fields.description: user who create this task

fields.name: assignee
fields.description: student who own this task

fields.name: subject
fields.description: Subject Name

fields.name: status
fields.description: Status of this task, default is NEW

fields.name: uuid
fields.description: Notification uuid

fields.name: message
fields.description: Notification message

fields.name: scope
fields.description: Notification scope, i.e., this notification is targeted to a subject group, or a school

fields.name: scopeId
fields.description: Scope id, if scope is SUBJECT_GROUP, the scope id is subject group uuid; if scope is SCHOOL, the scope id is school code

fields.name: eventType
fields.description:
AppContext event type, which will be set into the AppContext created when user clicks the notification
eventType must be camelCase alphanumeric

fields.name: eventTypeId
fields.description: AppContext event type id, which will be set into the AppContext created when user clicks the notification

fields.name: recipient
fields.description: List of uuid for the recipient

types.name: Event
types.description:
Event information when App is launched.
Various Scenarios:
Launch App from <Subject Group> page
Open <Assignment> page (from Assignment Listing page)
Open <Task> page (from either Dashboard or Notification)

fields.name: type
fields.description: e.g. "Launch_App", "Launch_Assignment", "Launch_Task"

fields.name: typeId
fields.description: e.g. UUID of subjectGroup / Assignment / Task

inputFields.name: start
inputFields.description: Assignment start date, format: ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME, e.g.,2007-12-03T10:15:30+01:00

inputFields.name: end
inputFields.description: Assignment end date, format: ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME, e.g.,2007-12-03T10:15:30+01:00

inputFields.name: scope
inputFields.description: Notification scope, i.e., this notification is targeted to a subject group, or a school

inputFields.name: scopeId
inputFields.description: Scope id, if scope is SUBJECT_GROUP, the scope id is subject group uuid; if scope is SCHOOL, the scope id is school code

inputFields.name: eventType
inputFields.description:
AppContext event type, which will be set into the AppContext created when user clicks the notification
eventType must be alphanumeric, max length: 50

inputFields.name: eventTypeId
inputFields.description: AppContext event type id, which will be set into the AppContext created when user clicks the notification

inputFields.name: recipient
inputFields.description: List of uuid for the recipient

enumValues.name: NEW
enumValues.description: New task

enumValues.name: IN_PROGRESS
enumValues.description: Work in progress

enumValues.name: COMPLETED
enumValues.description: Task is completed

enumValues.name: TEACHER
enumValues.description: Teacher

enumValues.name: STUDENT
enumValues.description: Student

enumValues.name: PRIMARY_1
enumValues.description: Primary 1

enumValues.name: PRIMARY_2
enumValues.description: Primary 2

enumValues.name: PRIMARY_3
enumValues.description: Primary 3

enumValues.name: PRIMARY_4
enumValues.description: Primary 4

enumValues.name: PRIMARY_5
enumValues.description: Primary 5

enumValues.name: PRIMARY_6
enumValues.description: Primary 6

enumValues.name: SECONDARY_1
enumValues.description: Secondary 1

enumValues.name: SECONDARY_2
enumValues.description: Secondary 2

enumValues.name: SECONDARY_3
enumValues.description: Secondary 3

enumValues.name: SECONDARY_4
enumValues.description: Secondary 4

enumValues.name: SECONDARY_5
enumValues.description: Secondary 5

enumValues.name: PRE_U_1
enumValues.description: Pre-U 1

enumValues.name: PRE_U_2
enumValues.description: Pre-U 2

enumValues.name: PRE_U_3
enumValues.description: Pre-U 3

enumValues.name: CLASS_SERIAL_NO
enumValues.description: sort students by class serial number

enumValues.name: NAME
enumValues.description: sort students by name

enumValues.name: LAUNCH_APP
enumValues.description: Launch Application.

enumValues.name: LAUNCH_ASSIGNMENT
enumValues.description: Launch Assignment. E.g. Teacher open assignment

enumValues.name: LAUNCH_TASK
enumValues.description: Launch Task. E.g. Student open task from Dashboard

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Introspection defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: 'A list of all directives supported by this server.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: 'If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given __Type is

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: An enum describing valid locations where a directive can be placed

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on queries.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on mutations.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fields.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fragment definitions.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fragment spreads.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on inline fragments.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a schema IDL definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a scalar IDL definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an object IDL definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a field IDL definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a field argument IDL definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an interface IDL definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an union IDL definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an enum IDL definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an input object IDL definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an input object field IDL definition.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if`'argument is true.

errors.message: Exception while fetching data (/__schema/types[8]/fields[5]/args[1]/defaultValue) : Invalid input for Enum 'StudentSortBy'. Unknown value 'CLASS_SERIAL_NO'
